basics.name: Phuong Le Van Hoang
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I am a kind of experienced full-stack Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the IT industry. Skilled in Research, Java, Spring Framework, Hibernate, MongoDB, MySQL, Nodejs, Express, Reactjs, Python, and TypeScript, RabbitMQ, Redis, Docker, Bitbucket pipelines.
I possess a strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Science - BS in Electronics and Telecommunications from Ho Chi Minh University of Technology.
